resources.string:
How to use the App: 
 1. Make sure there is an internet connection.
 2. Once you connect the sound detector and the sound controller devices, the app will be connected to them automatically.
 3. Measure the sound level with the sound detector device to get the sound level in the app.
 4. If the sound level is greater than 55dB, the sound level will be reduced to 55dB automatically.
